title: Mouse issues...
body:
So I have an interesting issue here. I have a G500s logitec mouse (wired). I've had it for a fair while (3 or so years) and it has served me well for everything. Now Lately I've been having issues with the game randomly lagging at points but that is a different issue (I think). Around the same time these lag spikes started to become a problem my mouse started to randomly disconnect during games as well. Strange thing is this is only for LOL that it decides to muck up. Times it commonly disconnects/stops working are: 

Lifting the mouse to re-adjust its position
When holding the mouse at the edge of the screen to move the camera
Twitching movements

So now I'm curious to know whether this is a mouse issue, laptop issue (yes I'm using a laptop atm...), or, since it only happens in LOL, a LOL based issue.. I'm no tech expert so if it's obvious to you then please enlighten me. Note: The only reason I'm posting in a League of Legends board is because as I stated it only happens during League games.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try the following.

* In device manager, under Human Interface Devices, select USB Input Device, Properties, Power management, Untick Allow the computer to turn off this device to save power.

It could be a driver issue? Try updating your graphics drivers and your mouse drivers (if it has some). That's my only suggestion :(

Good luck!
